text: satana meheyawu ema nayakayan dedena menma kudapola himiyan da ingrisi yuddhadhikaranayen jiwithakshayata pathwiya.ingrisi palakayan bhikshun wahanse namak wedi thaba marima sinhala jathiyata menma uthum buddhagamata da kala wishala apahasayak washayen lankawe pamanak nowa aasiya kara ratawal athara nosansun thawayak athi wiya.

jathika awasthawadaye sama rupakarayakatama erehi akhanda aragalayak haraha dhaneshwaraye siyalu kotaswalin kamkaru panthiya deshapalanikawa swadhina karaganime kshama wirahitha aragalaya, jathyanthara samajawadi kriyamargayak wistharanaya kirima saha liyon trotski wisin idiripath karana lada nowathina wiplawa nyaya meyata athulath we.

eya 1971 saha 1988 -1990 wasarawala rajya hamuda athin ghathanayata lak wu sinhala tharuna tharuniyan wenuwen da sankethathmakawa yukthiya ituwimaki.deparshwayema aparadhaeltitieeya saha sha්ri lanka rajyaya athara wu awasana yuddhayehidi ewani minis ghathana siduwannata athi parimawa 1988 – 1990 wasarawala sinhala tharuna tharuniyange hisa nathi mala siruru saha siruru nathi his pa්radarshanaya karana lada aakaraya mathakayata nanwa ganimen pamanakma wuwa sitha gatha hakiya.

“loketa parakase – gedarata maragathe” yanuwen sinhala kata wahare yedumak atha.lokaya idiriye sarwasadharana bawa penwamin (samahara wita) sathyawashayen ma ese wi namuth, thama samipathayin idiriye narumayin wannan memagin awagnyawata badun kere.wathman lokaye (suprakata) batahira prajawa ho batahira balawega hasirenne ihatha yedume parasparayen dakwena prathipaththiyen bawa lekhakaya ge adahasayi.enam batahira ratawal thama ratawala abhyanthara prajathanthrawadaya , manawa ayithiwasikam, madhyaya nidahasa ithasithin surakimin thama janathawata ek hankin bedana namuth, lowa anekuth ratawalata balahathkarayen athulath wi (wesesin ma thewana lowa ratawalata saha aagamika washayen thaman ha paraspara ratawalata) prajathanthrawadaya sthapitha kirime muwawen ma wenath handakin bedana bawayi.pasugiya da muwamar gadafi da eeta pera irakaye di sadam husen da thama balal ath wu swadeshikayan lawa ghathanaya karawuye mema siddhanthayata anukulawayi.

namuth ada me awasanawantha iranamata goduruwa sitina muslim samajayata swarnamaya yugayak pawathunu bawath owun ehidi lokayata labadun mehewara ha dayakathwaya adatath nuthana lokaya wishmayata pathkarawana suluya.
eheth eeta sudusu kramaya kawaredayi kawuruth methek kal apata kiya dunne natha.
ow eejansi karayo karoth meya nithi wirodhi.
esema adata da tharaka widyawa yanu aadhunikayange dayakathwaya nomasuruwa labiya haki "widyawan" athalossen ekaki.

wakugadu roginge mewan apahasutha handunagath janadhipathiwaraya eeta piliyamak lesa dena lada upades matha jathika wakugadu aramudale prathipadanawalin me sathkara madhyasthanaya idikerune wakugadu rogin sandaha newasikagara pahasukamwalata amatharawa thawath pahasukam rasak samagini.mese idikarana lada methsiri sewana wakugadu rogi sahana sathkara subasadhana ha paryeshana madhyasthanayen wakugadu rogin ha owunge pawulwala samajikayan sandaha nawathan pahasukam salasima, roginta ha anekuth awashyatha athi piris sandaha upadeshana sewa salasima, wakugadu rogin pera handunaganime sayana ha parikshana sandaha pahasukam salasima, parithana kandukarana kriyawaliya nirupanaya kirime aadarsha eekakaya, adhyapanika ha wenath pahasukam eekakaya, wakugadu rogaya pilibanda madihathwa katayuthu karana rajaye aayathana sandaha anthar aayathana sambandhikarana eekakaya, ekawara 250 denekuta sahabhagi wiya haki wakugadu roga niwarana pilibanda adhyapanika thorathuru labaganime pahasukam sahithawa me madhyasthanaya wakugadu roginge sharirika suwathawata amatharawa manasika suwaya pilibanda wishesha awadhanayak yomukara idikara athi heyin methsiri sewana wakugadu roginge gatalu rasakata wisandum labadena suwisheshi wyapruthiyak wanu atha.
sha්ri lankawe china thanapathithuma athulu china rajaya me katayuthu wenuwen labadun dayakathwaya pilibandawa sthuthiwantha wenawa.
